short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to send data via webhook in a specific format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to send data via the webhook using your own hotkey. 

The data can be plain text or a smart template.

You can create your smart template and use elements such as:
* Selected text from the current web page.
* The current url page
* Current data in ISO format
* Any other additional text

You can register your custom shortcut key to send data via webhook.
